text.more: The part of the network with coloured edges show different academic papers linked to their assigned topics. These topics are shown as larger blue nodes. The black edges represent the connections between authors and occur if the authors collaborated. There are also connections showing which authors wrote which papers. These connections, for visibilty, are all coloured white so are unseen but still show up when selected.
text.intro: Network of papers written on a similar topic and their authors.
text.title: TATA Co-author, Paper and Topic Network

legend.edgeLabel: Written on similar topics or written with another author
